title: Sophomore
description: Zane Garcia was the lead singer of Heartstroke, a rock band that became popular from the moment their debut album was released. They were a band that did everything for their fans, but after their sophomore record leaked online, the problems began.Zane looks back at how Heartstroke made him, and ultimately broke him, as he succumbed to the malevolence of addiction...
author: Matt Karpe
